events.title: Ninaithaale Inikkum
events.description: Relive the golden era with retro fashion and classic cinema, honoring iconic Tamil legends.

events.title: Culinary Class Wars
events.description: A dynamic three-round cooking competition where participants showcase their skills through non-fire appetizers, fire-cooked desserts, and entrées, judged on creativity, taste, and presentation to crown the ultimate chef!

events.title: Double Trouble
events.description: Double the Game, Double the Thrill! Switch between football and basketball on the fly, outsmart your opponents, and seize victory in this high-energy showdown!

events.title: Eureka Expedition: Treasure Hunt
events.description: A thrilling team-based treasure hunt testing students across business domains.

events.title: Jackpot!
events.description: An event with multiple rounds but each progressing round is a different game! Ranging from guess who, rapid fires, three truths and a lie to many more.

events.title: Dare 2 Duet
events.description: A dance duet competition involves two dancers performing a synchronized routine, showcasing creativity, teamwork, coordination, storytelling, technique, and originality.

events.title: Whodunit Quest: The Ultimate Treasure Hunt
events.description: A mystery-solving treasure hunt testing logic, teamwork, and quick thinking.

events.title: Otakon 3.0
events.description: Otakon will have carnival styled minigames where everyone can win prizes and will have a cosplay competition in the end.

events.title: Cine Replica
events.description: A real-time choreography replication competition, blending precision, memory, and stage presence, as dancers mirror pre-selected dance videos.

events.title: Dead Man's Sea
events.description: Two teams face off each other in a game of Human Battleship. Strategize, aim, and sink the opposition in this thrilling life-size twist on the classic game.
